titleStmt.title: A paraenetick or Humble addresse to the Parliament and assembly for (not loose, but) Christian libertie. Perused and allowed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Roger, 1604?-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons for Henry Overton in Popes-Head-Alley,
